title: Execute mRemoteNG over a Webdav drive
author: Catskan-zz
body_snippet:
Hi guys,

I find your software and it's just really good ! 

I use this on my personnal computer and works great.

So, I have a personnel WebDav drive and I'll want to start mRemoteNG over my WebDav.

I copy the portable version and when I start mRemoteNG.exe, I have a Windows error Message : 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17289964/67215217-64938b80-f421-11e9-84de-b9c6cc4519bb.png)

When I click "Yes", I"m redirect on https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/dotnet/framew...

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
comments.author: robertpopa22
